title: Game won't load / Bug Splat when pressing play
body: Hi I woke up this morning eager to get on the rift, unfortunately when I loaded my client and clicked play.... Nothing happened. So I tried again and I get nonstop bug splats. I can't even make it to the log in screen. I tried the hextech repair tool, I tried repair tool on the client, I even did a full uninstall / reinstall. Yet still clicking Play either does nothing, or it's a bug splat. I checked all my firewall settings. I've followed all the guides. Please send help or I can't save Gotham.

replies.body: I have been trying to launch the game myself and have been unable to do so. The lol logo just sits in the middle of the screen and does nothing. Is anyone else having this issue? I am fairly new at lol so not sure how to fix this.

Bugsplats are typically an indication that there's something going wrong with a driver or hardware interaction and the League client. I strongly recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure the most common solutions have been addressed for this problem.

Please let me know if you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps.
